ai-patthana16.14:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.14:1.1_3: If you don’t take pleasure in ending ...
ai-patthana16.14:1.1_5: they have no respect for the opportunity.
ai-patthana16.14:1.1_6: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.14:2.1_0: ... the five objects of sense desires, etc.
